>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/program/{programID}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves program details by Program ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"programID","in":"path","description":"The program ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"metadata","in":"query","description":"Include program metadata in response","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean","default":false}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The program source code.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string","title":"ProgramResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"Program not found"},"500":{"description":"Server error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
